name: Enea Trading Sp. z o.o.
membership:
Polish Electricity Association
Polish Association of Energy Trading
goal: Enea Trading is a subsidiary of the Enea Capital Group. It has competence in the field of trade in electricity, natural gas, property rights, CO2 emission allowances, coal and biomass. Enea Trading acquires electricity and basic fuel production for Enea Group as well as manages the portfolios of the the companies Enea SA, Enea Wytwarzanie Sp. o.o., Enea Elektrownia Połaniec S.A. and Enea Operator Sp. z o. o. The Company develops  strategies for business activities in the wholesale energy market, all while remaining active on many markets in the energy industry. The company was founded in October 2010 with its headquarters in the Świerże Górne (Municipality of Kozienice) in the Mazowieckie region. As of 2014, the company acts as a market maker on the Polish Power Exchange. The constant development and the aspiration to the accomplishment of its goals has resulted in Enea Trading with 82 employees on board playing a central role in the wholesale trade of entire Enea Capital Group.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Trans-European Networks
